titleStmt.title: An answer to the weavers case
titleStmt.author: Royal Lustring Company (London, England)

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by the cataloger; date of publication conjectured by Wing.
Answering objections by the Weavers' Company to the granting of a patent for making silk to the Royal Lustring Company.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
